document.discussion_title: Armed Offenders Squad helps with search warrant in Hamilton
document.topic_text: Armed Offenders Squad helps with search warrant in Hamilton Last updated 17:46, August 12 2016 A man has been arrested after police, including the Armed Offenders Squad, searched a Hamilton property. Police went to Bruce Avenue in Glenview about 5pm on Friday to execute a search warrant. A 40-year-old man was arrested without incident, Senior Sergeant Greg Foster said. Police left the area after about half an hour, he said.
